tool_description: Processes multiple customer feedback entries simultaneously and provides aggregated sentiment analysis results and statistics.

feedback_texts.description: Array of customer feedback texts to process

customer_ids.description: Customer IDs corresponding to each feedback

grouping_field.description: Field to group results by (customer_id, date, or none)

include_individual_scores.description: Whether to include individual sentiment scores in output

sentiment_model.description: Model to use for sentiment analysis

parallel_processing.description: Enable parallel processing for faster results

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least 2 feedback texts for batch processing.
Array size mismatch: Customer IDs and timestamps arrays must match feedback_texts length if provided.
Too many feedbacks: Maximum 1000 feedback entries allowed per batch.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Missing timestamps: Timestamps required when grouping by date.
usage: Provide array of customer feedback texts with optional customer IDs and timestamps. Configure grouping and processing options. Returns aggregated sentiment statistics and trends.

total_processed.description: Number of feedback entries successfully processed

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment classification for the batch

sentiment_distribution.description: Distribution of sentiment categories with counts

processing_summary.description: Summary of batch processing results and insights

low_confidence_count.description: Number of results below confidence threshold
